scripts: sed -i 's+elif \[ -f /etc/issue \] && grep -iq "Amazon Linux" /etc/issue ; then+elif grep -i "Amazon Linux" /etc/issue > /dev/null 2>\&1 || grep "cpe:.*:amazon_linux:2" /etc/os-release > /dev/null 2>\&1; then+' certbot-auto
autostart: sudo chmod 777 /etc/crontab; echo '32 17 * * 1 root certbot-auto renew --standalone --no-self-upgrade --pre-hook "service nginx stop" --post-hook "service nginx start"' >> /etc/crontab
